entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Flurries beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023
